meanings.definition: Very small in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The weensiest puppy in the litter was barely bigger than a teacup.
meanings.sent2: She picked the weensiest flower from the garden to put in her hair.
meanings.sent3: The weensiest ant in the colony tried to lift a crumb bigger than itself.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the weensiest whisper, barely audible in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The weensiest star in the sky twinkled faintly against the darkness.

meanings.sent1: The weensiest box held the most precious treasure.
meanings.sent2: He wore the weensiest hat, perched jauntily on his head.
meanings.sent3: The weensiest slice of cake disappeared in one bite.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the weensiest curve, but it lit up her whole face.
meanings.sent5: In the weensiest room of the house, a tiny mouse made its cozy nest.
